articles.author: Stacy Liberatore
articles.title: Meet the ordinary people who helped NASA shoot an asteroid off its course - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ordinary people around the world used small telescopes to help NASA shoot an asteroid off its course in humanity's first planetary defense test known as the DART mission.
articles.content:
NASA recently confirmed its DART mission, the first planetary defense test, was a success, but the agency had help from 31 citizen scientists who watched the epic event unfold from their backyards.
